lines.text: Gordon, how do you feel about a baby?
Not sure I could manage a whole one. Perhaps I'd better just have the dummy with a bit of cream.
He's 18! In another three years he'll be able to make his own bed and everything.
It doesn't seem five minutes since he was suckling on my nipple.
All men grow out of that, the same as I will.
[standing over the coffin of his aunt]
Apart from being dea-... she looks as though the holiday has done her some good!
Yes, the slicer... that should do the trick nicely...
What are you going to do?
Just going to slice Uncle Godfrey to death before lunch...
[Gordon is starting to have second thoughts]
